stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Florida
stateCompliance.content:
Residents of Hollywood are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance.

Florida law caps single-payment payday loans at $500 with a maximum fee of 10% of the loan amount, plus a $5 verification fee. For a $500 loan, you pay no more than $55 in fees. For installment payday loans, the maximum is $1,000 with fees capped at 8% of the outstanding balance on a biweekly basis. All lenders must comply with federal Truth-in-Lending Act disclosure requirements.

One of Florida's most important protections is the 'one loan at a time' rule. You cannot have more than one payday loan outstanding anywhere in Florida, and you must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another. This is enforced through a mandatory statewide database. Loan rollovers and extensions are strictly prohibited.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Florida must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one cash advance loan at a time in Florida
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Florida Office of Financial Regulation (OFR), Division of Consumer Finance
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate information, contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov.

faq.question: Where is your Hollywood cash advance office?
faq.answer: We're at 2345 Hollywood Boulevard, Suite 200, right near the famous Hollywood Beach Boardwalk. Easy access from I-95, US-1, and FL-A1A with convenient parking available.

faq.question: What are your hours in Hollywood?
faq.answer: Monday through Friday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Saturday 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM. Closed Sundays. Call (954) 555-0142 for holiday hours.

faq.question: How fast can I get approved in Hollywood?
faq.answer: Most customers receive approval and funding within 30 minutes. Apply online first and visit us to complete the process quickly.

faq.question: What documents do I need?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government ID, recent proof of income (pay stub or bank statement), and a blank check from your account. We'll explain all costs before you proceed.

faq.question: Are there other locations near Hollywood?
faq.answer: Yes! We serve Fort Lauderdale (7 miles), Dania Beach (5 miles), Pembroke Pines (10 miles), and Miramar (12 miles). Call for directions to your nearest location.
